description: A quarter-credit course devoted to a broad study of the field of biomolecular science through the
reading and discussion of primary and secondary literature across the field. While required of all
biomolecular science concentrators, this course is open to all interested students. P/N only.
Offered annually in the spring semester.  Prerequisite: BIO 150; CHEM 121 and CHEM 123, or CHEM
